title: Getting started with Google Cloud
target_audience: Technical leads who want to learn about the Google Cloud.
prerequisites: A laptop that can connect to the internet with a text editor you are familiar with.
No prior experience with the cloud is required.
objectives: Be able to create a Google Cloud account
Create and destroy a computation instance
Set up a Virtual Private Server
language: The course is given in Hebrew with slides and materials in English.

syllabus.title: Google Compute Engine
entries: Available machine types and how to configure them.

syllabus.title: Managed SQL databases in Google cloud
entries: Creating a  manage database in the cloud
